attributes.action: make Epping forest council fix my daughters flat
attributes.additional_details: My daughter has had a number of visit s from the council they have provided two electic fans to try and help with the damp these fans cost money to run she is a single working mum who suffers from a no of health conditions inc her heart. One council worker has said her flat needs the plaster removing in every room.  She has been told to clean it with bleach this does not work the mould is now growing on her bed and sofa
attributes.background: my daughter has to live in a flat full of mould and Epping Forest District Council are refusing to fix it. Every room has got mould growing on the internal walls. this flat is making my daughter and grandson ill.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you have made a complaint to the council, and you are not happy with the way it has been handled, you may be able to complain to the Local Government Ombudsman:

http://www.lgo.org.uk/make-a-complaint
